message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really love it. I'm offering it to you for $140.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product and would like to make a counteroffer of $130.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $135. Let's see if we can make this work!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counter with an offer of $130.
